sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>proclaim</radical>s "I am <kanji>noisy</kanji> and I am <kanji>picky</kanji>!" It keeps repeating this over and over to everyone you pass by.
meaningInfo: The townsfolk agree with your mouth, you are noisy and you are picky and you need to shut up.
readingMnemonic: You are so <kanji>noisy</kanji> and <kanji>picky</kanji> that the townsfolk hired <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the Samurai to shut you up.
readingInfo:
"Ken, your armor color is so last year. That squid you have is gross. Your sword is so gaudy. You talk like you're from the Edo Period, but it's Reiwa right now."

Your noisy and picky self just goes off on Ken the Samurai. He skulks off, defeated by your noisy and picky words.
